title: Best Friend*
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Crying in the parking lot
You don't know what you want
Gave you everything
I guess everything ain't enough
[Verse 2]
You say you lost your best friend
How do you think I feel?
You say it's over again
And this time is real
[Verse 3]
Time has ran away from me
You have taken everything I need
Cause you clearly don't know
I am a lost soul
[Chorus]
Every girl you've dated knows
That you lost a best friend
And that best friend was me
I just been so upset lately
[Post-Chorus]
I'm tired of the way your friends envy me
Cause I've been crying in the parkin' lot

[Verse 4]
Nothing has favoured me
And my disappointed friеnds
They say it was just a dream
But it happenеd in real life
[Chorus]
Every girl you've dated knows
That you lost a best friend
And that best friend was me
I just been so upset lately
[Post-Chorus]
I'm tired of the way your friends envy me
Cause I've been crying in the parkin' lot
